video_title: I Built A Business With Only $90

content_profile.title: I Built A Business With Only $90

key_takeaways: Solution: Tweet the idea and measure engagement, create simple form to capture demand (Difficulty: beginner)
Growth Tactic: Opportunistic promotion on viral content (Channel: viral)
Growth Tactic: Create scarcity with 'free for now but not forever' messaging (Channel: community)
AI Workflow: AI business implementation consulting
Strategy: Build community first, then create productized agency based on most common need

startup_ideas.title: AI implementation productized agency
startup_ideas.target_market: Companies wanting to integrate AI into workflows
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Businesses lack expertise to implement AI effectively
startup_ideas.validation: Survey community members about their specific AI needs

market_gaps.solution_approach: Tweet the idea and measure engagement, create simple form to capture demand

supporting_comments: Incredible value for us who just need ideas, inspiration
